app_descript:
Uplive-Live Stream, Go Live

Brief:

Uplive is your portal to a world of endless entertainment and social connectivity. It's a live-streaming platform that brings together charismatic hosts and enthusiastic viewers from across the globe. With round-the-clock streams filled with music, dance, gaming, and more, Uplive provides a vibrant space to watch, interact, and form lasting relationships, all while enjoying the richness of diverse cultures with a built-in translation feature.
